dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3264 IH: Biodiesel, Renewable Diesel, and Alternative Fuels Extension Act of 2017

action.action-desc: Mrs. Black (for herself, Mr. Kind, Mr. Valadao, and Mr. Costa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify certain tax incentives for biodiesel, renewable diesel, and alternative fuels.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Biodiesel, Renewable Diesel, and Alternative Fuels Extension Act of 2017.

section.header: Extension of biodiesel and renewable diesel incentives

paragraph.text: Subsection (g) of section 40A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking December 31, 2016 and inserting December 31, 2021.
Subsection (b) of section 40A of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following:
In the case of taxable years beginning after 2018, paragraphs (1)(A) and (2)(A) shall each be applied by substituting for $1.00 the following:

subparagraph.text: $0.75 for taxable years beginning in 2019, and

paragraph.text: Paragraph (6) of section 6426(c) of such Code is amended by striking December 31, 2016 and inserting December 31, 2021.
Subparagraph (B) of section 6427(e)(6) of such Code is amended by striking December 31, 2016 and inserting December 31, 2021.
Paragraph (2) of section 6426(c) of such Code is amended by inserting before the period at the end the following: ($0.75 for fuel sold or used in 2019 and $0.50 for fuel sold or used after 2019).

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to fuel sold or used after December 31, 2016.

section.header: Extension of excise tax credits relating to alternative fuels

subsection.header: Extension of alternative fuels excise tax credits

paragraph.text: Paragraph (5) of section 6426(d) and paragraph (3) of section 6426(e) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 are each amended by striking December 31, 2016 and inserting December 31, 2021.
Subparagraph (C) of section 6427(e)(6) of such Code is amended by striking December 31, 2016 and inserting December 31, 2021.

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (1) of section 6426(d) of such Code is amended by inserting (37.5 cents for fuel sold or used in 2019 and 25 cents for fuel sold or used after 2019) after 50 cents.
Paragraph (1) of section 6426(e) of such Code is amended by inserting (37.5 cents for fuel sold or used in 2019 and 25 cents for fuel sold or used after 2019) after 50 cents.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to fuel sold or used after December 31, 2016.
